root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = CLZ;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: SELECT id,lid,usenums,wecha_id,token,islottery,wecha_name,phone,sn,FROM_UNIXTIME(time,'%Y-%m-%d') as time,prize,sendstutas,FROM_UNIXTIME(sendtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as sendtime,is_used_in_wx,can_use_in_wx,use_condition,coupon_value, deadline FROM wx_lottery_record;
